item.description:
This will be the second meeting of the Freedom Is Fundamental Book Club. We will continue our discussion of the New York Times and Amazon.com #1 Best Seller The Revolution - A Manifesto by Ron Paul.

We will debate the outcome of the short story The Money Myth Exploded by Louis Even. (find this in the FILES area in the left hand column)

We will also be watching some short clips from THE MONEY MASTERS which will act as an introduction to our next conversation topic.

Refreshments will be served.
Please bring a friend!

PLEASE CALL 401-222-0659 for further information. DO NOT CALL THE LIBRARY. They apparently got a lot of calls last month and asked that people only call if they need directions.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a name tag

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL BOOK AND FILM SCREENING
